SV1.why_it_matters: Canonical design map stressing anti-singularity stance, harmonic safety, and decentralized swarm behaviors.
extracted_constraints: Preserve anti-collapse harmonic safeguards and decentralization in any upgrade path.
Keep systems human-scale and interpretable rather than control-oriented.
Align upgrades with four-lens framing and kenotic forgiveness themes.

SV2.why_it_matters: Defines PhaseCube ethos: bounded, non-collapsing, influence-not-command biasing with minimal, hackable structure.
extracted_constraints: Bias inputs must influence rather than overwrite state and remain bounded.
Maintain minimal, dependency-light, and tunable architecture.
Protect against convergence and runaway excitation via stochastic guards.

SV3.why_it_matters: Concrete HTML prototype showing audio-to-bias mapping, tunables (Path B, decay, strength), and rendering expectations.
extracted_constraints: Map input energy to spatial bias (depth/pan) with decay and clamping.
Expose tunable probabilities (e.g., BASE_PATH_B_P) and input decay/strength.
Keep simulation looping with pause/save controls and visible metrics.

SV4.why_it_matters: Implements tri-grid dialogue with delay-line memory and blended bias from audio or synthetic pulses.
extracted_constraints: Support multi-grid orchestration (core/echo/memory) with shared biasing.
Blend bias fields with delayed memory while clamping magnitude.
Track and expose core metrics such as energy and dispersion each step.

SV5.why_it_matters: Centralizes tunables including forgiveness damping, path probabilities, and bias weights for commodity hardware.
extracted_constraints: Keep defaults modest (grid sizing, fps) to run on commodity machines.
Expose weights for memory, crosstalk, and forgiveness damping.
Provide configurable path selection probabilities and alpha damping.

SV6.why_it_matters: Design notes for memory-biased upgrade: tri-grid dialogue, delay-driven bias, interpretability overlays, and tunable safeguards.
extracted_constraints: Document tri-grid roles and bias routing alongside interpretability metrics.
Retain structural plasticity hooks as TODO-style expansion points.
Keep input influence soft, memory-biased, and non-destructive.

SV7.why_it_matters: Minimal PhaseCube rewrite emphasizing periodic topology, local perturbations, and vectorized path A/B blending.
extracted_constraints: Use wrap-around topology and local perturbations instead of global flips.
Implement path A/B selection with parity influence and memory blending.
Expose small, interpretable tunables (flip prob, path B prob, alpha).

SV8.why_it_matters: Prior delta establishing lens-gated path B control, kenotic forgiveness, and procedural bias pulses with oracle snapshots.
extracted_constraints: Include lens mixing that clamps path B and damping based on metrics.
Model bias pulses with decay/strength/radius inspired by audio pan/depth.
Log or expose oracle/witness sampling for lineage visibility.

SV9.why_it_matters: Concrete lattice step implementation applying lens mix, bias gain, damping, and oracle selection over toroidal neighbors.
extracted_constraints: Separate metric gathering (energy, dispersion, bias load) from stepping logic.
Apply lensMix parameters (pathBProbability, biasGain, damping) during updates.
Maintain oracle selection sampling with parity/trace weighting.

SV10.why_it_matters: Clean minimal PhaseCube with pause/snapshot controls, depth sorting renderer, and path B-driven liquid updates.
extracted_constraints: Provide simple run controls (pause/resume, snapshot hooks) for demos.
Render or report sorted outputs to keep interpretation clear.
Preserve stochastic path B branching with alpha-based memory blending.

summary: Adds a new LKB delta that formalizes lens-gated, tri-grid bias routing with commodity-safe tunables, bias pulses, and oracle sampling, keeping influence-only ethos and interpretability from prior prototypes.

assumptions.label: Treat docs/Parallel-Paradox-Design.md as the base README for SV1 because no docs/README.md file exists.
assumptions.rationale: It is the only canonical design document at docs/ root and maps project principles referenced elsewhere.

assumptions.label: Node.js â‰¥18 with built-in test runner is available for executing the new scripts and tests.
assumptions.rationale: Chosen to avoid external dependencies while supplying required smoke/unit tests.
